pkgmetadata.longdescription: Design and Analysis for Factorial Experiments // Provides design- based and model-based estimators for the population average marginal component effects in general factorial experiments, including conjoint analysis. The package also implements a series of recommendations offered in de la Cuesta, Egami, and Imai (2019+), and Egami and Imai (2019) doi:10.1080/01621459.2018.1476246.
